review: The Fire TV is great overall. The remote feels fantastic, is easy to operate, and the interface is extremely responsive. Basically all of your major streaming applications are available, including a (finally!) usable interface for Prime videos.Bonus: You can sideload applications, like XBMC.Downside: No native DLNA player. I've had to sideload XBMC to stream local media, or use a network TV tuner. If they could add this feature, then the Fire TV would be a dream come true.
